terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback
Class FeedbackGroupManager

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.FeedbackSplitter
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.FeedbackGroupManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeedbackTarget
public class FeedbackGroupManager
extends FeedbackSplitter

A manager that performs feedback on a group of selected feedback targets by relaying the group feedback state to all selected event targets (the group). This manager is in essence a meta-manager for feedback managers, which perform the actual feedback management of the targets.

This manager's feedback event input is internally connected to all of the "target any" collateral event outputs of the managed feedback managers. Presumably all feedback managers are connected to the same targets. If the mouse is over any selected target (the group) then status and action events are relayed to all targets in the group.

The input events are used as follows:

  • Feedback, Status: Indicates when the status state may have changed on a selected target. Currently not used in group management but simply relayed to event targets.
  • Feedback, Select: Indicates when the select state may have changed on a target thereby possibly changing the makeup of the selection group.
  • Feedback, Action: Indicates when the action state may have changed on a selected target thereby changing the feedback of the selection group.

FeedbackGroupManager

public FeedbackGroupManager(StatusManager statusManager,
                            SelectManager selectManager,
                            ActionManager actionManager)
Constructs an FeedbackGroupManager for the specified feedback managers.

Parameters:
statusManager - The group status manager. Never null.
selectManager - The group select manager. Never null.
actionManager - The group action manager. Never null.
Method Detail

getTargetAnySource

public FeedbackSplitter getTargetAnySource()
Gets the collateral target "target any" event source, which is notified when the feedback state changes on any target.

Note that target state changes are a result of any changes to the target state whether internally or externally induced.

Returns:
Reference to the splitter.

getTriggerAnySource

public FeedbackSplitter getTriggerAnySource()
Gets the collateral target "trigger any" event source, which is notified when the feedback state changes on any trigger.

Note that trigger state changes are detected on the target itself and are not a result of any external feedback input to the target.

Returns:
Reference to the splitter.

getOverTargetSource

public EnableSplitter getOverTargetSource()
Gets the collateral target "over target" event source, which is notified when the mouse-over state changes on any target trigger.

Note that trigger state changes are detected on the target itself and are not a result of any external feedback input to the target.

Returns:
Reference to the splitter.

getAllowPauseSource

public EnableSplitter getAllowPauseSource()
Gets the collateral target "allow pause" event source, which is notified when the allow-pause state changes on any trigger.

Note that trigger state changes are detected on the target itself and are not a result of any external feedback input to the target.

Returns:
Reference to the splitter.

initTargets

public void initTargets(MultiShape target,
                        int status,
                        int select,
                        int action)
Initializes the managed targets. If the specified target is null all targets are initialized to the specified states. If not null only the specified target is set.

Parameters:
target - The target to be initialized. Null if none. Ignored if not a target.
status - Initial status feedback state (STATUS_???),
select - Initial select feedback state (SELECT_???),
action - Initial action feedback state (ACTION_???),
